summary: In a post-apocalyptic Liverpool, a man returns seeking revenge for his wife's murder - and everyone speaks perfect Jacobean English.
cast: Christopher Eccleston|Kevin Knapman|Michael Ryan|Kristopher Lundon|Joe Cottrell Boyce|Jean Butler|Andrew Schofield|Paul Reynolds|Justin Salinger|Eddie Izzard|Marc Warren|Fraser Ayres|James McMartin|Ged McCormack|Sammy Duplay|Carla Henry|Shaun Mason|Sophie Dahl|Anthony Booth|Anthony Dorrs|Mark James|Derek Jacobi|Diana Quick|Mathew Pollard|Carl Learmond|Patrick Graham|Alex Cox|Margi Clarke|Bianca Beyga|Carl Chase|Nichola Dixon|Vinnie Adams|Stephen Graham|Tony Maudsley|John McArdle|Jake Abraham|Michael Starke|Charles De'Ath|Tom Williamson|Sol Papadopoulos|Roger Appleton|Kim Ryan|Tod Davies|Margaret Matheson
title: Revengers Tragedy
